Resume

Education

  • MSc Machine Learning (GPA 1.0), Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen (2021 – 2024 )
  • MSc Computer Science (GPA 1.0), Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster (2018 – 2021)
  • BSc Computer Science, minor in Mathematics (GPA 1.0), Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster (2014 – 2018)
  • Abitur (GPA 1.0), Söderblom Gymnasium, Espelkamp (2014)

Experience

  • Teaching Assistant for Prof. Dr. Zeynep Akata, Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen (Apr. 2023 – July 2023)
    • Corrected, graded and presented solutions of exercises for Introduction to Machine Learning
  • Research Assistant for Prof. Dr. Zeynep Akata, supervised by Dr. Massimiliano Mancini, Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen (July 2022 – Dec. 2022)
    • Implementation benchmarks and own approaches for Multi-Attribute Compositional Zero-Shot Learning
  • Research Assistant for Prof. Dr. Christian Beecks, Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster (Aug. 2020 – Mar. 2021)
    • Presentations about sparse Gaussian approximations and Sum-Product Networks
    • Assistance in writing research papers
  • Teaching Assistant for Prof. Dr. Klaus Hinrichs and Prof. Dr. Jan Vahrenhold, Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster (Apr. 2017 – Sep. 2018)
    • Corrected, graded and presented solutions of exercises for CS I and II

Volunteer Experience

  • Member of the Student Council (Oct. 2014 – Sept. 2021)
    • Organization of events like the orientation week, movie nights, sports events, career fairs and the summer fair for the department
    • Committees: quality-improvement, exam regulations, reaccreditation committee, several appointment committees, president of the Fachschaftsvertretung (2018-19), vice president of the Fachschaftsrat (2021)
  • Exercise Instructor for Archery (Aug. 2015 – Oct. 2019)
    • Supervision of beginner’s courses for recurve archery at the university’s sports program

Skills

  • Languages: Python (proficient), R, C++, Java, SQL (basic)
  • Libraries: verl, PyTorch, Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Pandas
